meanings.definition: having the most jingle or jingles
meanings.sent1: The sleigh bells were the jingliest part of the holiday parade.
meanings.sent2: Her bracelet was the jingliest accessory she owned.
meanings.sent3: The jingliest cat in the neighborhood loved playing with bells.
meanings.sent4: The jingliest keys on the keychain were always easy to find.
meanings.sent5: The jingliest wind chimes filled the garden with cheerful sounds.

meanings.definition: in a manner that is the most jingly
meanings.sent1: The bells rang jingliest during the festive celebration.
meanings.sent2: She danced jingliest to the rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent3: The wind blew jingliest through the chimes, creating a melodious tune.
meanings.sent4: The coins in his pocket jingled jingliest as he walked.
meanings.sent5: The laughter echoed jingliest in the room, spreading joy to all.

meanings.definition: the most jingly sound or collection of jingles
meanings.sent1: The jingliest of all sounds was the ringing of the bells.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with the jingliest of melodies.
meanings.sent3: The jingliest of all jingles came from the tiny bell on the cat's collar.
meanings.sent4: The jingliest of memories came flooding back with the sound of the music box.
meanings.sent5: The jingliest of all jingles was the one that led them to the hidden treasure.
